This tests that UIEvent and its subclass will have sourceDevice set to be null by default, and it can also be passed when initialization.

On success, you will see a series of "PASS" messages, followed by "TEST COMPLETE".


PASS uievent is non-null.
PASS uievent.sourceDevice is null
PASS uievent.sourceDevice is non-null.
PASS uievent.sourceDevice.firesTouchEvents is false
PASS uievent.sourceDevice is non-null.
PASS uievent.sourceDevice.firesTouchEvents is true
PASS touchevent is non-null.
PASS touchevent.sourceDevice is null
PASS successfullyParsed is true

TEST COMPLETE
